name: Crypto Live Widget
author: Xgenious

sections.description:
Display coin market current price and daily price change ticker and crypto pricing table anywhere inside your website using smart crypto widget shortcodes.

CHECK CRYPTO WIDGET[FREE] DEMOS
Live Price Table Demo
Live Price Ticker Demo

Crypto Live Widget Pro Plugin[PAID]
Pro Version Demo (It extends the free version of crypto ticker widget plugin.)

AWESOME FEATURES

  • Add crypto live ticker using shortcode as your requirements
  • live Price Changes:- Display cryptocurrency price table with live price change .
  • More than 1200 cryptocurrencies Digital coin Supported
  • 10 cryptocurrency ico Supported(USD, EUR, JPY, AUD,INR ,etc)
  • Easy to use the cryptocurrency shortcode
  • Real-time live cryptocurrency update
  • No API KEY<
  • Used Coincap API
  • Cross browser support

CRYPTO LIVE WIDGET PRO[PAID] FEATURES

  • More than 1200 cryptocurrencies Digital coin Supported
  • 31 cryptocurrency ico Supported(USD, EUR, JPY, AUD,INR ,etc)
  • Digital currency History chart (1day, 7 days, 30 days,90days,180days,360days)
  • 03 Different Category Table With 03 Different Design
  • Easy to use the cryptocurrency shortcode
  • Real-time live cryptocurrency update
  • Unlimited number of price table / history chart / price ticker
  • No API KEY
  • Used Coincap API
  • Cross browser support
  • Filterable results
  • Visual Composer Compatible
  • Treanding Bitcoin ,Ethereum,Ripple,Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin ,EOS,Stellar,Cardano,NEO,IOTA etc History Chart.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/crypto-live-widget directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to Crypto Live option and here you see two options
    1.crypto table
    2.crypto ticker
    go here what you want for example goto to table, change the setting as per your need. or leave this and just copy thes shortcode given here it will take default settings.

  4. To embed the price list in a page or post, use the default shortcode: [xgenious_coincap_table_01]

  5. ONLINE DOCUMENTATION :- Click Here

short_description: Coincap Widget plugin allow you to easily create realtime cryptocurrency price and history char shortcode and show up anywhere on your site.
